faqs.question: How many kilometres are included per day?
faqs.answer: Each rental includes 50 km per day as standard. For example, a 3-day rental includes 150 km total. You can see your total authorised kilometres before confirming your booking.

faqs.question: Can I purchase extra kilometres?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can pre-purchase additional kilometres at 0.35 CHF per km during the booking process. This is cheaper than the excess charge of 0.50 CHF per km that applies if you exceed your authorised kilometres.

faqs.question: How is the excess km charge calculated?
faqs.answer: At the end of your rental, we record the start and end mileage. If you've driven more than your authorised kilometres, the excess is charged at 0.50 CHF per km. You'll receive an automatic payment link via email.

faqs.question: How do I receive my rental contract?
faqs.answer: After completing your online payment, the rental contract is automatically generated and sent to your email address. You'll also find a copy in your booking confirmation.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) as well as TWINT and bank transfers. Payment is required at the time of booking.

faqs.question: What documents do I need to rent a car?
faqs.answer: You'll need a valid driving licence (held for at least 1 year), a valid ID or passport, and a credit card in your name for the security deposit.

faqs.question: Is insurance included?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our rentals include comprehensive insurance with a deductible. Additional insurance options to reduce the deductible are available during the booking process.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Free cancellation is available up to 48 hours before your rental start time. Cancellations within 48 hours may be subject to a fee of one day's rental.
